block.p: Alexandra Anne Stumm, a daughter of Priscilla and Hans Stumm of Chestnut Hill, Mass., was married there yesterday to Jason Philip Pogorelec, a son of Phyllis and John Pogorelec of Clifton, N.J. The Rev. James G. Burke performed the ceremony at St. Lawrence Roman Catholic Church.
The couple graduated magna cum laude from Princeton University, where they met.

Alexandra Stumm, Jason Pogorelec Alexandra Anne Stumm, a daughter of Priscilla and Hans Stumm of Chestnut Hill, Mass., was married there yesterday to Jason Philip Pogorelec, a son of Phyllis and John Pogorelec of Clifton, N.J. The Rev. James G. Burke performed the ceremony at St. Lawrence Roman Catholic Church

Alexandra Anne Stumm, a daughter of Priscilla and Hans Stumm of Chestnut Hill, Mass., was married there yesterday to Jason Philip Pogorelec, a son of Phyllis and John Pogorelec of Clifton, N.J. The Rev. James G. Burke performed the ceremony at St. Lawrence Roman Catholic Church.
The couple graduated magna cum laude from Princeton University, where they met.

Mrs. Pogorelec, 24, was until recently an investment associate at Putnam Investments, the mutual fund company in Boston. She is to attend Harvard Business School in the fall. Her father is a financial planner in Boston for WS Griffith Advisors.
The bridegroom, 26, is an associate at Ropes & Gray, the Boston law firm. He received a law degree magna cum laude from Boston College. His father is a lawyer with a private practice in Clifton.
